div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 1910 Vito Superiore, near Reggio, Brut- tium, 1939 Burial: c. 387 B.C. (Procopio, Jenkins) Contents: 134 AR. Pot hoard Rhegium: 6 tetradr. (to Herzfelder 103) Terina: 1 st. (as Regling 54) Acragas: 1 tetradr. (with quadriga) 6 didr. Camarina: 4 tetradr. Catana: 5 tetradr. Gela: 5 tetradr. (to Jenkins 485) Leontini: 8 tetradr. Messana: 30 tetradr. Naxus: 1 didr. (as Cahn 110) Selinus: 1 tetradr. Syracuse: 41 tetradr. (to Tudeer 88 f.) Siculo-Punic: 4 tetradr. (Ziz) 7 tetradr. (horse/palm-tree) Athens: 1 tetradr. Corinth: 8 Pegasi (incl. Ravel P401/T551 and Ser. XIV) Ambracia: 4 Pegasi (as Ravel 68, 95-6, 101, 112) Leucas: 1 Pegasus (cf. BMC pl. 34, 17) Disposition: Reggio â€ Procopio, Rendiconti, Accademia di Archeologia, Lettere e Belle Arti, Naples (1953), pp. 3-27, illus. Jenkins, Gela, p. 161
